reviewText: I love the well written radio shows. It is a lost art and I was glad to order these for my collection. Howard Duff added the right touch of humor to Sam Spade's character, which the Humphrey Bogart movie version followed faithfully.
When busy working on computer, doing desk work or driving in the car, old time radio is just the ticket.
very nice. Product exactly as advertised
Just got it today I love Sam Spade just as much as The Whistler, Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar & The Shadow!

It's still amazing to me how radio turned out such dazzling shows as The Adventures of Sam Spade week after week for eight years.  Especially in light of what network television has become.  These shows are still so fresh and fun sixty years on..

Took this on a trip to the southwest and listened in the car.  Howard Duff is wonderful in the role of Sam Spade and this is by far my favorite old time radio show.  I received the cd within a week of ordering and couldn't be happier.
